page.description: Get the data entry mode for the table.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.MODE_GET() method returns a number that indicates the current Data_Entry_Mode for the table. The possible return values are:

item.name: 0 View
item.description: No data entry is currently taking place.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script can be attached to an OK button on a dialog to make sure the current records is saved before the dialog is closed.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() if tbl.mode_get()> 0 then parent.commit() end if parent.close()

section.description: This script tells you which mode you are in.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() if tbl.mode_get()= 1 then ui_msg_box("Mode", "Change mode") elseif tbl.mode_get()= 2 then ui_msg_box("Mode", "Enter mode") else ui_msg_box("Mode", "View mode") end if
